review: Nice features...Pros:1)  Prime videos are super easy to navigate and view.2)  Sends HDMI signals to automatically change TV input to Fire Stick when you press remote.3)  Convenient access to Netflix and remote control of YouTube with your phone.4)  Options to install existing and future applicationsCons:1)  Need separate remote for TV and Fire to control power and/or volume; otherwise, not needed.2)  Remote is easy to lose (small)3)  No quick way to put it back on Stand By (at least I haven't found a way)The primary reason I purchased the Fire TV Stick was to avoid turning on my PS3 to watch Prime or Netflix.  Goal achieved and using the Fire TV Stick is quicker and easier with a wide range of added features.
